search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Content Snare (content-snare.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Content Snare is: [https://contentsnare.com/pricing/](https://contentsnare.com/pricing/) .

*   Simple client portal
*   Approval system
*   Pre-made email templates
*   Zapier integration

All prices in USD

Think of a request as a form that you send to your client, asking for any amount of content, information or files.

Plans are limited by the number of requests that are active at the same time. Active requests are ones that your clients can access and fill out.

Say your limit was 50.

You could send 50 requests right away. If a week later you mark them as "complete" or "archived", you'd be able to send 50 more.

Once you mark a request as complete or archived, your client will no longer have access.

A migration is when we convert one of your existing online forms or PDF forms into a Content Snare template.

Plus Plan = 1 free migration  
Pro Plan = 2 free migrations

One free migration is limited to 40 questions. Beyond this, we will provide a quote. If your plan includes multiple free migrations, you can  combine them into one larger template.

Once you have signed up for a plan, simply email us a copy of the form you want to re-create in Content Snare.

Custom features and pricing

Custom Solution

Lets us work with you to help you unleash the full potential of Content Snare without restrictions. Whether you need 200 requests or 10000, we can tailor a plan to you.

[Talk to us ![Image 3](blob:http://localhost/3517ffedee28ca86a67a7a4df4ed0ef2)](https://contentsnare.com/contact/)

![Image 4](blob:http://localhost/3517ffedee28ca86a67a7a4df4ed0ef2)

![Image 5](blob:http://localhost/3517ffedee28ca86a67a7a4df4ed0ef2)

### All Plans Include

![Image 6](blob:http://localhost/3517ffedee28ca86a67a7a4df4ed0ef2)

#### Unlimited clients / recipients

Create as many clients or recipients as you need.

![Image 7](blob:http://localhost/3517ffedee28ca86a67a7a4df4ed0ef2)

#### Unlimited reminders

Set up as many email reminders as you like for each request.

![Image 8](blob:http://localhost/3517ffedee28ca86a67a7a4df4ed0ef2)

#### Unlimited questions & upload areas

Requests can include any number of questions or file uploads.

![Image 9](blob:http://localhost/3517ffedee28ca86a67a7a4df4ed0ef2)

#### Unlimited templates

Save requests or sections as templates to use again later.

![Image 10](blob:http://localhost/3517ffedee28ca86a67a7a4df4ed0ef2)

#### Drag and drop request builder

Set up as many email reminders as you like for each request.

![Image 11](blob:http://localhost/3517ffedee28ca86a67a7a4df4ed0ef2)

#### Simple client portal

Your clients get a link where they can access their request at any time from any device.

![Image 12](blob:http://localhost/3517ffedee28ca86a67a7a4df4ed0ef2)

#### Approval system

Approve questions or send them back for changes if needed.

![Image 13](blob:http://localhost/3517ffedee28ca86a67a7a4df4ed0ef2)

#### Pre-made email templates

Get started quickly without writing your own reminder emails.

![Image 14](blob:http://localhost/3517ffedee28ca86a67a7a4df4ed0ef2)

#### Integrations

Use Content Snare as part of a greater workflow.

![Image 15](blob:http://localhost/3517ffedee28ca86a67a7a4df4ed0ef2)

#### Effortlessly transition with our

Onboarding Service
------------------

### Get the benefits of Content Snare, without the time investment

Setting up new software and training your team can be a daunting task. When you're time-poor, the last thing you need is more work. Our concierge onboarding takes the load off. We'll set up your account in an optimal way so you can start saving time in as little as 2 weeks.

[Learn More](https://contentsnare.com/onboarding-service/)

Frequently asked questions
--------------------------

How does the pricing work?

Your plan includes a number of active requests and team members. Team members can create and edit requests. The people you send requests to do not count towards your limit.

What is a request?

A request is like a form. It can have any number of questions or file uploads.

You send a request to a person, then Content Snare will periodically remind the person to fill it out.

If you send one to another person, that’s 2 separate requests.

Once a request is completed by the person, it no longer counts towards your plan limit.

Will my clients know how to use it?

The client interface can be used by just about anyone. We often hear from happy customers that they are surprised that even their most technologically-challenged clients can use it.

How secure is Content Snare?

Protecting your data, as well as your clients’ data is our first priority. Content Snare uses several best-practice safeguards to preserve the integrity and security of your information. Those include encryption, network isolation, firewalls and authentication. We regularly backup your data. Learn more about our security [here](https://contentsnare.com/security/).

Can I change plans?

You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. If you have a month where you need high volume, you can switch up for a month and down again later. It only takes a minute.

We pro-rate any fees paid. This means that when you upgrade, you only pay the difference for the remainder of your current billing cycle. When you downgrade, your account will be credited for the difference in price. That credit will discount future bills until it runs out.

What forms of payment do you accept?

All major credit cards. For Custom plans over $2000 per year we can issue invoices payable by bank transfer in USD or AUD.

How often does Content Snare contact my clients?

That's totally up to you. There is a default communication template that defines how frequently your clients are sent reminders, but you can create as many as you like.

Do you offer discounts for nonprofits?

Yep. You can use the chat widget to enquire or simply [contact us](https://contentsnare.com/contact/).

What is your cancellation and refund policy?

You can cancel at any time inside the application from the settings panel. You will retain access to your data until the end of your subscription period.

We don’t offer refunds except in rare circumstances. You can trial the product for free for 14 days with no credit card.

What if I hit my usage limits?

You will see a message that your plan limits have been exceeded. Upgrading is as simple as clicking the new plan you want inside the app. Downgrading is just as simple. In both cases, you would receive a credit for the remaining subscription period for the old plan. That then gets used by the new plan.

I’m worried it will take some time to set up. Can you help?

Like most changes to your company process, there will definitely be some time involved in setting up Content Snare. However with templates, you can often set it up once and reuse that work over and over.

If you have questionnaires or forms that you would like us to replicate in Content Snare, [contact us](https://contentsnare.com/contact/) for a quote.

Will I be charged tax?

Australian customers are charged GST.

![Image 16](https://contentsnare.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/Content-Snare-Content-Collection-Handbook-cover.jpg)

Instead, grab our:

1\. **Content Collection Handbook** - Our best advice on how to get what you need from clients on time, no matter what tools you use.

2\. **Success Blueprint** - Everything you need to know about how to get the best results with Content Snare.

3\. **Boss Pitch Deck** - This will help you convince your boss & team why you need Content Snare.

All free. No strings attached.

It's free! Click the button below to get it.

[Get The Pack ![Image 17](blob:http://localhost/3517ffedee28ca86a67a7a4df4ed0ef2)](https://contentsnare.com/pricing/#cbeda39d54)

Content Snare Pricing: Eliminate the information collection bottleneck and create an amazing experience for your clients.
